snippet: Margaret Atwood and Howard Jacobson are the latest authors to be commissioned by Penguin Random House’s Hogarth imprint to write their interpretations of plays by Shakespeare, the publisher is to announce on Monday.
abstract: Margaret Atwood and Howard Jacobson are latest authors to be commissioned by Penguin Random House’s Hogarth imprint to write their interpretations of plays by Shakespeare.
lead_paragraph: Margaret Atwood and Howard Jacobson are the latest authors to be commissioned by Penguin Random House’s Hogarth imprint to write their interpretations of plays by Shakespeare, the publisher is to announce on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Two More Writers For Shakespeare Effort
headline.main: Two More Writers for Shakespeare Effort
